text: and now the third day was come, and the morning appeared, and behold, thunders began to be heard, and lightning to flash, and a very thick cloud to cover the mount, and the noise of the trumpet sounded exceeding loud, and the people that was in the camp feared.

segments.text: and now the third day was come, and the morning appeared, and behold, thunders began to be
heard, and lightning to flash, and a very thick cloud to cover the mount, and the noise
of the trumpet sounded exceeding loud, and the people that was in the camp feared.
